entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: [QUIC] QuicListener #67560
  • Hang while waiting for runtime to suspend thread in busy loop #67559
  • [release/7.0-preview3] Test failure JIT\\Regression\\VS-ia64-JIT\\V2.0-Beta2\\b311420\\b311420\\b311420.cmd #67558
  • [Localization] Confirm English sentence #67556
  • [Localization] Improvement for English resouce #67555
  • Incorrect behavior of the ToString () method when converting DateTime by format string #67562
  • [API Proposal]: Make some System.Net.Security functions/properties public for System.Net.Quic #67552
  • .NET 7.0.100-preview.2.22153.17 crash on RHEL 8+arm64 #67551
  • [release/preview3] Test failure in System.Diagnostics.Tests.ProcessStreamReadTests.TestAsyncErrorStream_SynchronizingObject #67549
  • [arm64] Perf_FileStream.FlushAsync benchmark hangs on Debian 11 #67545
  • [Question] ReadyToRun (crossgen2) debug dll have "optimized" DebugInfo section, that does not allow set breakpoint. #67541
    7.0.0
  • [mono] Default Interface Implementation of Static Virtual Methods #67540
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] ILLinker update broke wasm builds #67538
  • [NativeAOT] Httpclient timeout #67537
  • Fix System.Text.Json source code annotation RequiresUnreferencedCodeAttribute by moving it to class level #67536
  • GetMemberWithSameMetadataDefinitionAs returns incorrect declaring type #67533
    7.0.0
  • Binder should update the input array #67531
    Future
  • Increase the size of the regex cache #67530
  • HttpClientHandler.SupportsAutomaticDecompression throws PlatformNotSupportedException on net6.0-maccatalyst #67529
  • Consider deleting CallingConventions.cs #67519
    Future
  • [Question]Is there a sample for tracking the http request time? #67518

Closed

  • [android][mono] Test failure System.Net.Sockets.Tests #66241
  • Crossgen2 - switch over signatures to use eager serialization #41988
    Future
  • ReadyToRunCodegenNodeFactory cleanup / refactor #13386
    7.0.0
  • SQL DB Events collected via DiagnosticSourceEventSource don't include stacks #64020
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\Performance\\CodeQuality\\Benchstones\\BenchF\\NewtE\\NewtE\\NewtE.cmd #60238
  • Test failure JIT\\Methodical\\xxobj\\operand\\refanyval\\refanyval.cmd #60278
  • Use REP MOVSB on Ice Lake+ for locals init #66872
  • Test failure JIT\\Methodical\\explicit\\misc\\_relexplicit1\\_relexplicit1.cmd #60952
  • Test failure JIT\\Methodical\\Arrays\\lcs\\_rellcsval\\_rellcsval.cmd #61338
  • Test failure JIT\\Methodical\\Arrays\\lcs\\_speed_rellcsbox\\_speed_rellcsbox.cmd #61646
  • Test failure JIT\\Methodical\\eh\\leaves\\oponerror_ro\\oponerror_ro.cmd #62695
  • Test failure JIT\\Methodical\\gc_poll\\InsertGCPoll\\InsertGCPoll.cmd #63033
  • Test failure Loader\\classloader\\StaticVirtualMethods\\NegativeTestCases\\UnimplementedAbstractMethodOnAbstractClass\\UnimplementedAbstractMethodOnAbstractClass.cmd #63180
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\Methodical\\MDArray\\GaussJordan\\plainarr_cs_d\\plainarr_cs_d.cmd #64362
  • Test failure JIT\\jit64\\gc\\misc\\structfp1_3\\structfp1_3.cmd #64887
  • Test failure JIT\\Generics\\ConstrainedCall\\vt1_il_d\\vt1_il_d.cmd #65170
  • Test failure JIT\\Regression\\JitBlue\\GitHub_18522\\GitHub_18522_2\\GitHub_18522_2.cmd #65348
    7.0.0
  • Test failure Loader\\classloader\\generics\\Instantiation\\Negative\\Type_ofT_Inherit_FromT\\Type_ofT_Inherit_FromT.cmd #65349
  • Test failure profiler\\eventpipe\\reverse_startup\\reverse_startup.cmd #65352
  • Test failure GC\\Scenarios\\MinLeakGen\\minleakgen\\minleakgen.cmd #65354
  • Test failure profiler\\unittest\\metadatagetdispenser\\metadatagetdispenser.cmd #65645
  • Test failure JIT\\jit64\\opt\\inl\\caninline_ro\\caninline_ro.cmd #65647
    7.0.0
  • Test failure baseservices\\threading\\threadpool\\bindhandle\\bindhandle1\\bindhandle1.cmd #65685
  • Test failure JIT\\HardwareIntrinsics\\X86\\Lzcnt\\Lzcnt_ro\\Lzcnt_ro.cmd #66689
  • Test failure JIT\\Methodical\\Boxing\\seh\\try_il_r\\try_il_r.cmd #65686
  • Test failure JIT\\jit64\\opt\\rngchk\\ArrayWithThread_o\\ArrayWithThread_o.cmd #65687
  • Test failure JIT\\jit64\\localloc\\eh\\eh03_small\\eh03_small.cmd #65883
    7.0.0
  • Test failure profiler\\transitions\\transitions\\transitions.cmd #66049
  • Test failure baseservices\\threading\\generics\\Monitor\\EnterExit08\\EnterExit08.cmd #66370
  • Test failure JIT\\jit64\\opt\\osr\\osr001\\osr001.cmd #66441
  • Test failure JIT\\HardwareIntrinsics\\X86\\Sse41\\ConvertToVector128_ro\\ConvertToVector128_ro.cmd #66629
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_40444/Runtime_40444/Runtime_40444.sh #66690
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\HardwareIntrinsics\\X86\\Fma_Vector128\\Fma_r\\Fma_r.cmd #66926
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\SIMD\\DivSignedUnsignedTest_r\\DivSignedUnsignedTest_r.cmd #67019
  • Please add a stable sorting algorithm to the base library (eg timsort or rust-style) #67546
  • [release/preview3] System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests.RevocationTests.DynamicRevocationTests failures #67547
  • Cookie header values should be separated by semi-colon not comma. #42856
    Future
  • Support custom type generated marshalling on prior to net7 tfms #67390
  • [mini] gshared: Implement static virtual method `constrained.ldftn` in the JIT #61672
    7.0.0
  • System.Text.json deserialize doesn't support case insensitive Hashset #67311
  • Enumerable.Chunk throws OutOfMemoryException for very large chunk sizes. #67132
    Future
  • JsonSerializerOptions.IgnoreReadOnlyProperties ignores collections #67514
  • [API Proposal]: Of method for List #67431
  • [API Proposal]: Optional class for less if-else usage #67432

PullRequests

Created

  • Disable deleting call counting stubs #67563
    area-TieredCompilation-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix in-process decoding of DateTime in EventSource #67557
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] [infrastructure] Update Windows server queue #67554
    area-Infrastructure
  • Disable `Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.WindowsServices.Tests` for #67550
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, blocking-clean-ci
  • Recursive validation for Options #67548
    area-Extensions-Options, community-contribution
  • Fix createdump on Unix platforms that do not implement process_vm_readv #67544
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Don't pass --minimize to Xcode 13.3 dsymutil #67543
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [tests] Re-enable generic math Create tests on iOS #67542
    arch-arm64, area-System.Runtime, os-ios, os-tvos
  • [HTTP/3] Reenable ResponseCancellation_ServerReceivesCancellation #67535
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [release/6.0] [AOT] Don't set the 'CorrectedSynthesize' flag in the objc_imageinfo section. #67534
    Servicing-consider, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios, 6.0.x
  • Project file hygiene #67532
    area-Meta, 7.0.0
  • Enable IDE0060 (Remove unused parameter) analyzer #67527
    area-Meta
  • Split Reflection and SourceGen TypeInfos #67526
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Don't detect link on path #67525
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Skip crossgen restore when running in source build #67521
    area-Setup
  • Allow custom IExternalScopeProvider in LoggerFactory via DI #67520
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution

Merged

  • Updating the generic math interfaces according to the last API review #67453
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix handling of makeref/refvalue in generic code #67523
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Make handling of invalid code more robust #67524
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Disable some interop tests on Win-ARM32 #67553
    arch-arm32, disabled-test, os-windows, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Some test fixes #67373
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix parent test folder name #67528
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Concatenate multiple cookies with semicolon #67455
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Updated branch name, from master to main. #67522
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Avoid pre-allocating large arrays in some scenarios for Enumerable.Chunk #67210
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • JIT: Optimize unused array allocations #67205
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable tests/profiler/eventpipe/eventpipe on JIT stress runs #66473
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Align nodes when `!SupportsRelativePointers` #67516
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • Changing the logic for how we deal with RegexOptions.IgnoreCase matching. #67184
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Change `CrossLoaderAllocatorHash` to not use the GC #67160
    area-TieredCompilation-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Support immutable types with configuration binding #67258
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • [PERF][MAUI] Update maui iOS build sed command #67263
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [arm64] Add RCPC ISA (8.3+) and use ldap for volatile reads #67384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Add perf-wasm pipeline #67312
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [Group 8] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting` #67511
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • [Group 9] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.WindowsServices` #67512
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • [wasm] EmccCompile: Add support for compiling sequentially #67483
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Manually update C# compiler version to a more recent preview #67440
  • [Group 7] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Console` #67459
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging
  • [release/6.0] Don't cache commandline in coreclr diagnostics server #63356
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Don't force `TieredCompilation=0` for SuperPMI replay job #67489
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve handling of common Regex sets #67365
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Fixes #42643 allow keys with colons in JSON config #66886
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Handle concurrent reads and concurrent writes on MsQuicStream #67329
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Reenable crossgen2 promotion outside version bubble #66983
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize Matrix4x4 Decompose with fewer stores #66351
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Removed JIT (uint) cast workaround to elide bound-checks in CoreLib #67448
    community-contribution
  • Fix System.DirectoryServices.Protocols to work on Linux #67338
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Update breaking-change-rules.md #66978
    documentation, area-Meta
  • Clean-up CacheEntry #59110
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • Add xarch `blsmsk` #66561
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • WIP: switch over JIT/Methodical tests to run using merged wrappers #65597
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Add arm64 cross-arch msi installers #67265
    Servicing-consider, area-Setup
  • Use MemoryMappedFileAccess.Read when searching a memory mapped file #67386
    area-HostModel, community-contribution
  • More precise writebarrier for regions #67389
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Reflection Invoke refactoring to support future byref-like and IL emit features #66357
    area-System.Reflection, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • [Group 9] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.Systemd` #67513
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • Linux-bionic (Android libc w/o Android interop) initial implementation #66147
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [draft][wasm] JSImport/JSExport prototype #64493
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [AOT] Don't set the 'CorrectedSynthesize' flag in the objc_imageinfo section. #67441
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-jit directory #62843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-vm directory #62885
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Add a --aot-lazy-assembly-load command line option to load assemblies #67103
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 6.0.5
  • Use no-recent-activity in inactive Draft PRs #66771
    area-Meta
  • Discard casts when storing normalize-on-load locals #66389
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Sort properties by protection level in structures. #63339
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • [Mono] Fix warnings to enable W4 on Windows. #66710
    os-windows, area-Build-mono
  • JIT: Optimize range checks for X >> CNS and for short/byte indices #67141
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Llvm 13x #67416
    NO-MERGE, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Add ProcessorCount Event to RuntimeEventSource #65581
    area-System.Diagnostics, 7.0.0
  • JIT: Move constant vectors to op2 from op1 #67502
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix KeepNativeSymbols to work on mono as well #66594
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Type activator should be order agnostic #67493
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • [debugger][wasm] ValueTypeClass refactoring. #63626
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • First commit for ppc64le support #67378
    area-Build-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Optimize bswap+mov to movbe on xarch #66965
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
